review: Love it for the money! This cheap little stick does not disappoint. It blows away, and has in fact replaced my Netflix subscription. I have one for each TV in the house and love it. No boxes, no wires. Just a tiny USB stick and wireless signal. Highly recommend!!
author: Jeff K.

review: I received my Fire TV Stick 2 days after I ordered it! This is the second one I have ordered. My daughter took the first one to college to use on her laptop! Easy to install and works great streaming Netflix!
author: Pat

review: Good, but way more lag and buffering than expected from all the ads Amazon put out about it. Laptop, phone, tablet... you name it, all noticeably faster on the same wifi connection.
